18 
19 import rospy
20 import threading
21 
22 from .rpi_ros_utils import send_reboot_command, send_shutdown_command
23 
24 from niryo_robot_msgs.msg import CommandStatus
25 from niryo_robot_msgs.srv import AdvertiseShutdown, AdvertiseShutdownRequest
26 
27 
28 class AbstractShutdownManager(object):
29  def __init__(self, fake=False):
30  rospy.logdebug("ShutdownManager - Entering in Init")
31  self._fake = fake
32 
33  rospy.Service('~shutdown_rpi', AdvertiseShutdown, self.callback_shutdown_rpi)
34 
35  self._advertise_shutdown_service = rospy.ServiceProxy('/niryo_robot_status/advertise_shutdown',
36  AdvertiseShutdown)
37 
38  def callback_shutdown_rpi(self, req):
39  if req.value == AdvertiseShutdownRequest.SHUTDOWN:
40  self.request_shutdown()
41  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'Robot is shutting down'
42  elif req.value == AdvertiseShutdownRequest.REBOOT:
43  self.request_reboot()
44  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, 'Robot is rebooting'
45  else:
46  return CommandStatus.UNKNOWN_COMMAND, 'Incorrect value: 1 for shutdown, 2 for reboot'
47 
48  def request_shutdown(self):
49  self.advertise_shutdown()
50  send_shutdown_command_thread = threading.Timer(1.0, self.shutdown)
51  send_shutdown_command_thread.start()
52 
53  def request_reboot(self):
54  self.advertise_reboot()
55  send_shutdown_command_thread = threading.Timer(1.0, self.reboot)
56  send_shutdown_command_thread.start()
57 
58  def advertise_shutdown(self):
59  try:
60  rospy.wait_for_service('/niryo_robot_status/advertise_shutdown', timeout=0.2)
61  self._advertise_shutdown_service.call(AdvertiseShutdownRequest.SHUTDOWN)
62  except (rospy.ROSException, rospy.ROSInterruptException, rospy.ServiceException):
63  pass
64 
65  def advertise_reboot(self):
66  try:
67  rospy.wait_for_service('/niryo_robot_status/advertise_shutdown', timeout=0.2)
68  self._advertise_shutdown_service.call(AdvertiseShutdownRequest.REBOOT)
69  except (rospy.ROSException, rospy.ROSInterruptException, rospy.ServiceException):
70  pass
71 
72  def shutdown(self):
73  print('Shutdown')
74  if not self._fake:
75  send_shutdown_command()
76 
77  def reboot(self):
78  print('Reboot')
79  if not self._fake:
80  send_reboot_command()
